title: "Driverless Truck Innovator TuSimple: Not As Strong As Some Think"
excerpt: "On April 15, 2021, TuSimple (NASDAQ:TSP) became the first self-driving company listed on Nasdaq with an opening price of USD 40 per share. Even though it was the first listed company in this field, TSP is not the first company running road tests with autonomous trucks."
